headline: Metals Selloff Hits Mining Stocks
summary: A global metals selloff dragged down shares in companies ranging from Arizona copper miners to the world's largest gold producer to a silver firm with assets stretching from Alaska to Quebec. Although futures prices for gold, silver and copper are down sharply Monday, they remain near records after a wild year of trading.

content.title: Metals Selloff Hits Mining Stocks
content.summary: A global metals selloff dragged down shares in companies ranging from Arizona copper miners to the world's largest gold producer to a silver firm with assets stretching from Alaska to Quebec. Although futures prices for gold, silver and copper are down sharply Monday, they remain near records after a wild year of trading.

headline: Miners stumble as gold falls, Needham cuts Coinbase price target
summary: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including mining stocks Newmont (NEM) and Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) falling as gold (GC=F) and silver prices (SI=F) slide from recent record highs, while Needham analysts cut their price targets on crypto-related companies Coinbase Global (COIN) and Robinhood Markets (HOOD). Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
